text: Mars is known as the red planet due to iron oxide dust.
title: Mars

text: Jupiter is the largest planet and has a giant storm called the Great Red Spot.
title: Jupiter

text: Saturn has distinctive rings made of ice and rock particles.
title: Saturn

text: Venus has a thick atmosphere and the hottest surface temperature in the solar system.
title: Venus

text: Mercury is the closest planet to the sun and has a very thin atmosphere.
title: Mercury
